article_text: Greg Orman is offering Kansas a rare opportunity to elect a senator who won’t be beholden to party ideology from the get go. It’s a chance that won’t come around again any time soon.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Greg Orman, Pat Roberts, Senate, Kansas, Claire McCaskill
article_metadata.title: Greg Orman pinpoints U.S. Senate’s coolest caucus | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
Greg Orman is offering Kansas a rare opportunity to elect a senator who won’t be beholden to party ideology from the get go.
It’s a chance that won’t come around again any time soon.
